snippet: The cache, which the Indian Navy said weighed about 500 pounds, was found aboard a Pakistani vessel; eight Pakistanis were detained.
abstract: India says it intercepted Pakistani boat off its west coast that appeared to have about 500 pounds of heroin aboard, worth almost $100 million.
lead_paragraph: The cache, which the Indian Navy said weighed about 500 pounds, was found aboard a Pakistani vessel; eight Pakistanis were detained.

headline.main: India Says It Seized Heroin Believed to Be Worth Nearly $100 Million From Boat
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: 500 Pounds of Heroin Seized
